1000001354.title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
1000001354.description: The film chronicles Milkha Singh's, aka The Flying Sikh's, incredible struggle - from being an orphan to becoming one of India's greatest athletes.

1000053838.title: Baby
1000053838.description: Post 26/11 Mumbai attacks, a special intelligence task force will stop at nothing to foil another such assault on the Indian soil.

1000071777.title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
1000071777.description: A simple guy, Pawan Kumar Chaturvedi, who is a Hanuman bhakt takes it upon himself to help a lost; mute girl, reach her home in Pakistan!

1000084315.title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
1000084315.description: Crown Prince Yuvraj Vijay Singh and his doppelganger, a carefree stage actor, Prem Dilwale's lives get entangled in a royal battle of romance and deceit.

1000120365.title: Badhaai Ho
1000120365.description: Getting a new sibling at 25 is the last thing Nakul expected. Will he ever come to terms with the embarrassing 'good news' of his parents being pregnant?

1000212789.title: Raid
1000212789.description: Fearless income tax officer Amay Patnaik carries out a risky raid at the mansion of the most powerful man in Lucknow. Inspired by real-life events.

1000213010.title: Taqdeer
1000213010.description: Avinash gets separated from his childhood love Priya. Will fate play its part and bring the two estranged lovers together as grown-ups?

1000213089.title: Baaghi 2
1000213089.description: A tough army officer searches for his ex-lover's child, who is kidnapped under mysterious circumstances. However, his quest is not easy.

1000216088.title: Vikram Vedha
1000216088.description: Police officer Vikram finally captures Vedha, a dreaded gangster. When the latter engages Vikram in a mind game, it challenges his notion of good and evil.

1000233697.title: Total Dhamaal
1000233697.description: When 50 million bucks are at stake, six eccentric people will do whatever it takes, including braving the wild. Who will win this race against time?

1000235906.title: Junglee
1000235906.description: Back in his hometown after years, Raj befriends Bhola, an elephant. As time passes, he discovers a deep-rooted poaching scandal, which changes his life forever.

1000239103.title: De De Pyaar De
1000239103.description: 50-year-old Ashish has fallen in love with Ayesha, who is half his age. Their romance turns into a comedy, when he takes her to meet his parents and ex-wife.

1260009172.title: Super 30
1260009172.description: Based on the life of ace mathematician Anand Kumar, who trained 30 underprivileged students to crack one of the toughest entrance exams in India - IIT.

1260011536.title: Mission Mangal
1260011536.description: Based on the true story of India's finest scientists who rose above hardships and failures to make us the only country to reach Mars in its first attempt.
1260011536.detail: Mild violence, Mild sexual content and references

1260012713.title: Chhichhore
1260012713.description: Divided by time, united by a tragic incident. In a bittersweet reunion, seven middle-aged friends take a walk down the memory lane at the least expected place.
1260012713.crisp: Some Sexual References, Some Mature Content

1260014263.title: Housefull 4
1260014263.description: A set of six lovers had to part ways in 1419. Six centuries later, they meet again only to realise that they are marrying the wrong partners. Old villains and a series of mishaps turn this reincarnation drama into a comedy of errors.

1260022117.title: Tanhaji
1260022117.description: As Aurangzeb captures the Kondhana Fort, Tanhaji Malusare, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj's trusted military leader and braveheart, ventures out to win it back.

1260025583.title: Baaghi 3
1260025583.description: In a twisted turn of events, when a group of deadly terrorists kidnap Ronnie's elder brother in Syria, he sets off on a mission to bring him back.

1260086570.title: Hate Story 2
1260086570.description: Hell hath no fury like a woman wronged! After witnessing her lover die, Sonika goes on a killing spree to avenge him.
1260086570.crisp: Violence, Some Scenes of Intimacy, Some Coarse Language

1770003314.title: MS Dhoni: The Untold Story
1770003314.description: A tell-all tale about the life and times of Indian cricketer Mahendra Singh Dhoni, mapping his journey from a ticket collector to a celebrated sportsman.
